Articles.Content:
Ok, here's some more ideas for Challenge Wreaths!

Sun: Place a craft in solar orbit with an apoapsis of <2Gm (well within Moho's orbit)

Moho: Enter Moho orbit and return to Kerbin without refueling.

Eve: Already covered --- Eve Ascent

Gilly: ???

Kerbin: Already covered --- SSTO

Mun: Preform a Munar free-return trajectory using only one burn from LKO.

Minmus: ???

Duna: Land an aircraft without the use of parachutes or retrorockets.

Ike: ???

Dres: Get a craft to the bottom of the giant canyon safely.

Jool: Use a gravity assist from one moon to reach another moon, aid Joolian orbital capture, or escape the Joolian system.

Laythe: Land a jet aircraft horizontally, then use that same craft to ascend into orbit.

Vall: ???

Tylo: Already covered --- Tylo Ascent

Bop: ???

Pol: Have a rover freefall over 3km vertically without damage.

Eeloo: Orbit Eeloo and return to Kerbin without refueling.

Thoughts, feedback? I tried to emphasize what makes each world unique.

So is there any way to change how the images link or add a text to each ribbon to show what they mean? Hovering the mouse over shows no text, so I have no clue what people's ribbons mean. And it just links to this forum page..

So is there any way to change how the images link or add a text to each ribbon to show what they mean? Hovering the mouse over shows no text, so I have no clue what people's ribbons mean. And it just links to this forum page..
That'd be fairly browser-dependent and require a silly amount of backend work. The Rules Page describes what each ribbon is pretty clearly.

There is multiple reasons I can't put caption when you hover it. The first is that it is a whole image, so I can't use alt for it. I also can't put any script on it since I do not own the forum, so I am limited to what I can do, so only images. I could put text over it, but then it would lose all of it charm. Like Zeroignite said, you have to read the rules

Alright thanks I was just wondering, I didn't dig to deep so didn't see the rules page thanks for pointing that out. I may have to start adding some ribbons when I play again soon .

Edited September 12, 2013 by MaGicBush
Not sure if its been suggested yet but there should be options for fly-bys and/or gravity assists

A flyby would be the ribbon without an orbit device. Of course, that only makes sense if you haven't been in Orbit around that body before, but I think the reasoning is, that getting into Orbit is the next step after getting an encounter (aka flyby). About a gravity slingshot: as far as I understand, a flyby always gives you a gravity slingshot, so only a slingshot which actually got you somewhere should count. And I have no idea how one could represent that. Besides, the original rules page is probably the better place for suggestions like that.

I've restarted to work on the next version! Planned feature are complete rewrite of the script that generate the image, custom ribbon order, some optimisation at other places and new devices for ribbons.

I would like to be able to include the Grand Tour Shield, but I can't successfuly extract each layer as a single png. I would need someone to do it for me if you want me to be able to make a generator for it.

If you have any other feature suggestions about THE WEBSITE, be free to write them here!

(For suggestion about the ribbons, post them on the ribbon thread)

Edited September 17, 2013 by Moustachauve
Also, I would need a couple of tester in a day or more, to make sure everything works fines since I changed most of the code
Hey they are cool, but I kinda have forgotten what I am had done all those 800 hours since mid 0.19 (where I bought the game)

can you please add a 'extreme EVA' option for Ike please.

other then that, brillant!

Edited September 26, 2013 by SpaceSphereOfDeath

The ribbons have been updated to version 1.1.0 !

Those are the changes for this version. Alot of code have been changed, so it is possible that many bug appeared.

Changelog :

- SSTO Wreath is now "Challenge Wreath"

- Meteor Device - Like Impactor, but for hitting the atmosphere.

- Armada Device - For staging more than three craft in orbit and then sending them all off to another world in one encounter window.

- Flag or Monument Device - For leaving an artistic marker on another world.

- Complete rewrite of the script generating the image

- You can now customize the order the ribbons will show

- You can choose between forum resolution or full resolution

- Extreme EVA is now available for Ike

Edited September 27, 2013 by Moustachauve

Some cool new stuff...great!

But the wreath has gone missing for me again. Can't even see it as an option on the ribbon creation screen this time.
You are absolutly right! I forgot to update a little part in the database, they should now be back, thank you
Mine looks small now (Kerbin and moons), but i,m sending something in Jool's direction on the next transfer window. Should start filling up

So, apparently to the distress of Mr. Manley, I have successfully put a kerbal into orbit around Kerbin using only stock, solid boosters, and got a probe into orbit around Mun using only stock solid boosters, and the new, small inline RCS tank - needed ~100m/s to circularize and solids are too binary for that. Perhaps a ribbon for doin' a solid (Duna solid has a nice ring to it?) anyhow, maybe a solid booster ornament. *shrugs*

Yeah, I'm going to try and go to Duna or maybe even Jool on just solids and a bit of RCS. I doubt I can get intoa circular orbit anywhere with solids past the Mun, but landing on a solid body is mostly a problem of aiming and aerobraking, so i think this might be a neat decoration to add, since it's not entirely impossible, at least for probe missions.

Cheers!

Weird, I am able to log on. Do you still have the issue? can you tell me what time it was when you tried and it errored? (And timezone, please)
So, it seems i am doing something wrong, as i am unable to generate any ribbons. For some reason, when i click the generate ribbon button nothing happens. Any ideas out there?
Can you give me a detailed report of what you have selected please?

To be frank, i can't select anything; when i am at the ribbon generator, there are only two buttons available> generate ribbon and mission flag. Clicking both does nothing...

here a link to what i see http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/index.php?page=0

Edited October 4, 2013 by lkalales
Do you have javascript enabled?
Since i am using Firefox 24.0 there is no option to enable/disable jawascript, and i have already added http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/ on the exceptions list and still nothing

Here is a link about how to disable Javascript on firefox. Make sure to do the opposite of what it said, and try again. I don't have any issue with my firefox

http://www.ghacks.net/2013/07/30/how-to-disable-javascript-in-firefox/

I tried that and the only thing i get in the script is [00:19:41.605] Error in parsing value for 'filter'. Declaration dropped. @ http://code.jquery.com/ui/1.10.1/themes/base/jquery-ui.css:1172

And i even tried uninstalling firefox and reinstalling in case something was off, and still not working.Meh!

Edited October 5, 2013 by lkalales
